data.text: @olusogaowoeye So it’s a windfall for us as compared to what the government forecasted. Hope to to see its dividend.

@olusogaowoeye It's now they should remove this subsidy oh, let us just experience the "hard" once and for all, if PDP comes and meets it, they will spend it.if we dont di it, they will put it and squander it.
@ibrahimolajeje @Theojess2 @olusogaowoeye If Jonathan and PDP had not used our brains right . We would be exporting cassava bread to Ghana Niger and Cameron right now

@olusogaowoeye @ahmadu5_isah Just as how Nigeria cannot be replaced so also Russia cannot be put aside. The world is unjust to Russia and I will forever stand with Putin Kremlin against homosexual gay loser west .

@ibrahimolajeje @Theojess2 @olusogaowoeye Unfortunately, the flour Mills shutting down will also translate to increased demand for cassava as input for animal feeds which will result in increase in price of Garri. 

But wait when it’s happens, “nah Buhari cause am”.
@olusogaowoeye America did not push Ukraine to slap Russia. Let's not promote this kind of thinking. Our young men will go to parties abroad, say things like this and get laughed at.
@Theojess2 @olusogaowoeye The biggest producers of wheat in the world are at war. Their farmers have stopped going to their wheat farms
